alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 5:52AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Forest and northwestern Florence Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 552 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Headwaters Wilderness, or 18 miles southwest of Iron River, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tipler around 605 AM CDT. Wisconsin Slough Natural Area around 610 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
